messages.TRMSG_PRE_DOUBLE_BATTLE_1:
Zac: Jen, watch this! I’m going to
use everything you’ve taught me!
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_DEFEAT_1:
Zac: Wow. Someone that’s even
better than Jen...
messages.TRMSG_POST_DOUBLE_BATTLE_1:
Zac: I don’t care if I get to meet
the greatest Trainer in the region... I’d still rather learn from Jen.
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_NOT_ENOUGH_POKEMON_1:
Zac: Would you be interested in battling
the two of us at the same time?What I mean is, do you have two or more
Pokémon with you?
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_REMATCH_1:
Zac: This time, I’m not gonna let you
down, Jen! I promise!
messages.TRMSG_PRE_DOUBLE_BATTLE_2:
Jen: Here comes a Trainer.
Zac, you ready? Let’s do this!
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_DEFEAT_2:
Jen: I just got embarrassed in front
of my little buddy here...
messages.TRMSG_POST_DOUBLE_BATTLE_2:
Jen: Zac, I’m so sorry.
I’m a failure as your instructor.
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_NOT_ENOUGH_POKEMON_2:
Jen: Would you like to have a
two-on-two Pokémon battle with us?
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_REMATCH_2:
Jen: Here comes our Trainer!
Are you ready this time?
